!Fishermen's Guild Member: In order to harness the power of water spirits you will need to get a *sweet aromatic fluid.* Bring me some and i'll make you a Fishing Shot. The more fluid you get,the better the Fishing Shot. I have a list of the monsters who have it. [Quest _426_QuestforFishingShot 31579-2.htm|"Show me the list of monsters."]
